message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, let's try a more uneven split!
I'll give you a slightly more uneven split, but I still want a decent share!
You're getting desperate, time to make a serious offer!
I'm not getting desperate yet, but I'll give you a slightly better offer!
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll make one more serious offer!
